newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-ENGLISH LEAGUE FIXTURES FOR MARCH 28 TO APRIL 2.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ENGLISH LEAGUE FIXTURES FOR MARCH 28 TO APRIL 2.

text.p: - English league soccer fixtures for March 28 to April 2:
English division one - Barnsley v West Bromwich, Charlton v Huddersfield, Tranmere v Southend.
English division two - Wrexham v Millwall.
English division one - Crystal Palace v Birmingham, Oxford v Queens Park Rangers, Portsmouth v Bradford, Sheffield United v Reading, Stoke v Oldham, Swindon v Norwich, Wolverhampton v Grimsby.

English division two - Brentford v Bury, Bristol City v Gillingham, Burnley v Luton, Chesterfield v Blackpool, Peterborough v Bristol Rovers, Preston v Notts County, Rotherham v Walsall, Stockport v Crewe, Watford v Bournemouth, Wycombe v Shrewsbury, York v Plymouth.

English division three - Barnet v Cambridge, Carlisle v Doncaster, Chester v Brighton, Darlington v Hull, Exeter v Mansfield, Hartlepool v Colchester, Hereford v Fulham, Lincoln v Torquay, Northampton v Wigan, Rochdale v Swansea, Scunthorpe v Leyton Orient.
Note: No Scottish league matches scheduled.

English division one - Birmingham v Charlton, Bradford v Stoke, Grimsby v Ipswich, Huddersfield v Sheffield United, Norwich v Oxford, Oldham v Swindon, Port Vale v Tranmere, Queens Park Rangers v Wolverhampton, Reading v Barnsley, Southend v Portsmouth, West Bromwich v Crystal Palace.
English division two - Blackpool v Rotherham, Bristol Rovers v Wrexham, Bury v Wycombe, Crewe v Preston, Gillingham v Brentford, Notts County v Peterborough, Plymouth v Watford.

English division three - Brighton v Barnet, Cambridge v Lincoln, Colchester v Darlington, Doncaster v Exeter, Fulham v Rochdale, Hull v Hereford, Leyton Orient v Carlisle, Mansfield v Hartlepool, Scarborough v Scunthorpe, Swansea v Chester, Torquay v Northampton, Wigan v Cardiff.
English division two - Bournemouth v Stockport, Luton v Bristol City, Shrewsbury v Burnley, Walsall v Chesterfield.
English division three - Brighton v Barnet.
English division two - Millwall v York.
